h1: Calories in a Shot of Bourbon
assumptions: Standard 1.5 fl oz (44 ml) shot, 80-proof (40% ABV), straight—no mixers or ice.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, serving size, and any additions; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard shot of bourbon contains about 97 calories, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of bourbon?
faqs.a: About 97 calories for a standard 1.5 oz 80-proof shot.

faqs.q: Does bourbon have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No—pure bourbon has 0 g carbs, fiber, or sugars; calories are from alcohol.
Proof strength and volume; higher proof means more calories per shot.
Yes, straight bourbon is keto-friendly with 0 g net carbs per shot.

faqs.q: How does bourbon compare to other whiskeys?
faqs.a: Similar—most 80-proof whiskeys are ~97 kcal per 1.5 oz shot.
